meanings.definition: Imaginary lines on the Earth's surface running north-south and measuring distance east or west of the Prime Meridian.
meanings.sent1: The map showed the longitudes clearly, helping us understand the Earth's layout.
meanings.sent2: Navigators use longitudes to pinpoint exact locations on the globe.
meanings.sent3: The longitudes on the globe seemed to dance as the Earth spun around.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of longitudes was a compass guiding her through the geography lesson.
meanings.sent5: The longitudes stretched across the globe like a giant ruler, dividing it into sections.
